features: Our Age Defense Face Moisturizer contains an antioxidant complex of Rosemary, Echinacea and Vitamin E
Just because the Bulldog's a wrinkly old beast, it doesn't mean that you have to be.
Incredible natural skin care ingredients with carefully selected man-made ingredients to deliver super performance at an affordable price.
All our products are purpose built for men and contain amazing natural ingredients.
Our products never contain artificial colors, synthetic fragrances, or ingredients from animal sources.
body.description: Bulldog is man's best friend. Designed from the ground up with male skin care as their focus, all Bulldog products combine the best of nature and science to work simply and effectively while dealing with the specific issues faced by men's skin. Whether it's regular or sensitive skin, Bulldog has the answer. All Bulldog products contain brilliant natural ingredients and we combine these with carefully selected man-made ingredients to offer exceptional performance at an affordable price. From shave gel to face wash, beard oil to our award winning Original Moisturizer and everything in between, Bulldog has something for every man. Bulldog products never contain artificial colors, synthetic fragrances or ingredients from animal sources. All of our products are suitable for Vegans to Vegetarians and have been certified by Cruelty Free International. Turns out, Bulldog really is Man's Best Friend.We have a simple approach to the way we build our products and business: Do it the right way.Products we love made by people we know. We work with two main factories here in the UK in Froome, Somerset and in Preston, Lancashire. They make all of our skincare line. We also manufacture a small number of our products through specialist factories outside of the UK where they have unique skills.The best of nature and the best of science. We think that nature provides some incredible skincare ingredients. We harness these in conjunction with carefully selected man-made ingredients to deliver super performance at an affordable price.Treating people fairly. Whether it's our factories, farmers or other partners, we always aim to act with integrity and care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says. Starting to like the Bulldog stuff.
reviews.reviewText: It's a 3.3oz.small bottle of lotion, that does what it says. The. The effects are noticeable it helps with the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. That said, nothing feels like that cool little metal roller ball with the slippery goo inside under your eyes in the morning. Waking up after brushing my teeth & shaving, if it's that kind if day & rolling some of that goo under my eyes is a fresh way to start the day that's all I'm sayin' They both do a great job of moisturizing, i just wish the roll-on had more product inside. That's why i got this, my roll-on ran out & i decided to try it. I figured it was just a larger amount of the same slippery goo that's inside the roll-on ( they share similar ingredients) but this is more like a standard lotion, maybe a little thinner. Even when you're behaving" exercising, hydrating & getting enough sleep this is a great daily moisturizer. I also use a jar of Vitamin E which you'd think would render these products superfluous but the Bulldog products have something extra. And a start your day feeling not even my favorite aftershave can match. I think it's the cool metal ball but that slippery goo is nice too. Maybe I'll use both. But I do like this lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my husbands dry skin moisturized
reviews.reviewText: I bought this moisturizer as stocking stuffer for my husband. He has normally dry skin, but he says this moisturizer leaves his skin nice and moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, good scent, doesn't make me break out.
reviews.reviewText: Most moisturizers make me feel greasy, don't absorb, or make me break out, except for this stuff. I ONLY use their products now and my skin has literally never looked better. Smell is a nice earthy smell, calmong and not overpowering. I really love this product and I'm the typical dude that doesn't really do much facial skincare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works good not the best smell though.
reviews.reviewText: Feels good not too oily either nothing much to say about it my only complaint is the smell isn't great hard to describe almost like mud or clay. Its not horrible smelling but not particularly attractive and liners. I think the smell is the only thing holding this back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing, no fragrance, feel good, not oily and great price
reviews.reviewText: Great moisturizer, feel fresh when applied, it's not oily and great price especially compare to other products providing the same benefits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it!
reviews.reviewText: I don't know too much about skin care but my face feels good putting this stuff on. I usually put it on after (electric) shave. My face feels moist even hours later. On my second bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product line out there...
reviews.reviewText: ABSOLUTELY LOVE this product ! I love the whole line of Bulldog skincare products ! I find the scents as addicting as the feel of the product ! The anti aging moisturizer has a different scent than the original moisturizer line... To me, it has a subtle yet satisfying scent of marijuana ! : ) I don’t smoke pot, but have always found the smell of it appealing. Not only do i love the scent of this product, but it truly is effective in rejuvenating the skin. You notice the difference immediately upon application—a soft, supple, non-greasy, dewy, youthful complexion. I should note that i am a female, and this line remains a favorite part of my daily and nightly skincare routine. I bring it every where with me, and apply it around the clock (it’s literally therapeutic for me). It also beats out other product lines in how clean and refreshing it feels—it applies clean and continues to feel refreshing and silky no matter how many times you reapply (no peeling, no stickiness, no flaking—no matter how many layers you apply). I even put this product on my young children who have sensitive skin. Can not say enough good things about this product line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A larger bottle option would be nice for the home. The current size is perfect for travel.

He usado algunas cremas para el cuidado de la piel y esta es la mejor que he probado, te deja la piel muy humectada y eso es agradable!! la volveré a comprar una vez que se termine, es muy rendidora, compre la versión original es mas espesa.
I’ve used this for some 10 years and very happy with it.
No es grasoso, aroma discreto, me gusto mucho.

Sí hidrata y deja la piel suave, solo que el olor puede no agradarle a cualquiera, ya es que es de aroma herbal, aunque sí es algo fuerte (para quien busca cremas faciales sin fragancia).EDITADO: Después de un tiempo de uso, puedo decir que sí disminuye un poco algunas líneas de expresión y es buen matificante, aunque el olor sí algo fuerte, para mi gusto. Producto recomendable ya que no deja la piel grasosa y se siente fresca después de aplicarlo.
Considerando que mi esposo no usaba crema, y esta le gusto en consistencia y formulación en una buena señal.Los ingredientes son ideales y la calidad precio es buena.
